name: test_e2e_with_logs[321_CMD_BLIND_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BLIND_001` |
| **Name** | Time-based blind command injection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | blind_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; sleep 10`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20sleep%2010`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~48000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:40:39.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BLIND_001-1769917239569-g9rlh pattern_id=CMD_BLIND_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20sleep%2010 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BLIND_001-1769917239569-g9rlh pattern_id=CMD_BLIND_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20sleep%2010 client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```

```
